name: Hanway Associates
slogan: Strategic consultancy specialising in cannabis research, new market entry and M&A strategy
description:
Our clients include Licensed Producers of cannabis, pharmaceutical and FMCG companies, investment funds and innovative startups.

We help companies navigate this complex and rapidly changing industry with bespoke projects and ready-to-buy reports.

jobs.title: Cannabis Industry Junior Analyst
jobs.description:
Hanway Associates is a consultancy providing bespoke insights, research, campaigns, creative services and events for the cannabis industry. Our focus is on Europe's role in the global cannabis market.

We are looking for a Junior Analyst and/or Junior Consultant to join our team and help support the founders.

This role will require a confident all-rounder with a business background who can establish client needs, quickly draft up concise reports, conduct research and present findings to the client. The role requires the individual to bring their own set of skills, ideas, network and value - you will not be micro-managed so a proactive and assured nature is needed. This role will also require some travel!

 
We need a competent individual who can:

- Build well presented research assets to short deadlines
- Gather critical information from meetings with various stakeholders and produce useful reports
- Manage projects, develop project plans, and monitor their performance
- Draw up sustainable strategies
- Be flexible in terms of delivering projects, managing projects and sales


Qualifications:

- Relevant experience in the field of startup consultancy and/or analysis 
- Examples of previous consultancy work or projects
- Knowledge of European drug policy and regulatory systems
- An interest in the cannabis industry
